  Analysis of food consumption data from TidyTuesday
author: Jo Hardin
date: September 18, 2024
format: html
---





```{r}
food <- read.csv("food_consumption.csv")

library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(food, aes(x = food_category, y = consumption, color = food_category)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(
    x = "Food Category",
    y = "Consumption",
    title = "Relationship between foods and their consumption",
  )
```
